description.lang: The Remote PSR03-A is a simple control can control AV device through Z-Wave-to-IR extender, and it can also controls 2 lighting groups ON/OFF via basic set, based on Z-Wavetechnology.It is a Z-Wave plus product, it supports the security, OTA... Those newest features of theZ-Wavetechnology.Z-Wave is a wireless communication protocol designed for home automation, specifically to remotely control applications in residential and light commercial environments. The technology uses a low-power RF radio embedded or retrofitted into home electronics devices and systems, such as lighting, home access control, entertainment systems and household appliances.
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline
Lighting group 1
Lighting group 2
The interval time for auto report the battery level. 0 means turn off auto report battery. The default value is 12.The value is in minutes.
The interval time for auto report thebattery level.
Setting the BASIC command value to turn on the light. The 0xFF(-1) means turn on the light. For dimmer equipment 1 to 100 means the light strength. 0 means turn off the light.
-1 (0xFF) means turn the light on
Turn off the light
Set the light to level 1-99, 99 is full brightness
Customer function switch, using bit control.Bit0: Switch AV control/Lighting group control. (0: AV control, 1: lighting group control)
AV Control
Lighting Group Control
Setting the BASIC command value to turn on the light in the association group 2. 0 means using the value of configuration 2 to set.
BASIC Command On (0xFF)
Use the value set by configuration parameter 2.
Setting the BASIC command value to turn on the light in the association group 2.
Setting the BASIC command value to turn onthe light in the association group 3. 0 means using the value of configuration 2 toset.
BASIC Command On (0xFF)
Use the value set by configuration parameter 2.
Setting the BASIC command value to turn on the light in the association group 3.
